item.title: Lootbox Sm
item.description: LootboxSimulator Github Link Introduction This project is an Angular Single-Page Application based on the concept of “lootboxes”, random virtual rewards commonly found in video games. The goal of this project is to recreate the anticipation and uniqueness of opening such a reward with interesting random items. A working demo of this project can be found here. Technologies Leveraged Angular v9.x Material UI Libraries / npm Packages Faker.js Lorem Picsum Angular Flex-Layout ngx-clipboard Core Functionality In a typical use case, the user will navigate to the root of the application (ex: https://devonjsmith.
